appetizers.name: Caesar's Salad
appetizers.description: Try our fresh caesar salad with homemade caesar dressing right from our very own kitchen.

appetizers.name: Loaded Potato Salad
appetizers.description: We boil and dice our red-skinned potatoes with the skin on and add bacon bits to this homemade appetizer.

appetizers.name: Potato Salad
appetizers.description: We peel these potatoes and before they are boiled and diced and prepared for you.  This is great for customers who may not like the extra ingredients of our loaded potato salad.

cold sandwiches.name: Club
cold sandwiches.description: Our style of club comes with turkey bacon and roast beef.  Choose your type of bread and cheese.  Let us know if you want to remove the LTO, mayo, or mustard.

cold sandwiches.name: Peanut Butter and Jelly
cold sandwiches.description: Our vegetarian option is also great for kids.  Adults love it, too.

hot sandwiches.name: Meatball Sub
hot sandwiches.description: The best meatball subs in town!  Ask for slice banana peppers or jalepenos if you like some heat.

hot sandwiches.name: Grilled Cheese
hot sandwiches.description: Our vegetarian option is also great for kids.  Adults love it, too.  (Ask us about our vegan option as well.  No butter.)

desserts.name: Vanilla IceCream Cone
desserts.description: Ask for toppings. We also have bowls.

beverages.name: Sweet Tea
beverages.description: Our ice cold tea comes one of two ways: sweet, or in the harbor!  Just kidding, we have hot tea and lemonade.

beverages.name: Hot Tea
beverages.description: Careful! It is served hot!  Let us know if you like cream or sugar.
